{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3501259,"name":"","username":"Carlo_Yves","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/ecd19e/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-04T00:55:53.709Z","cooked":"

I’ve been trying to make an differential drive autonomous in pathplanner, for the most part everything seemed alright but when we try to make a straight line to follow, the drivetrain goes in an irregular motion instead of a linear path.

Our first theory is that it was some problem with the configuration or the PID, but after changing and trying every idea we had, we noticed that in the pathplanner telemetry the commanded speed was going up and down instead of being a linear output.

image1600×900 186 KB

Does anybody has a way to fix this? We have especially tried changing the feed forward and PID but this doesn’t change that the commanded speed.
